note: GEO. D. BARNARD & CO. ST. LOUIS.
p: In the matter of the application of Maxin K. Peterson for writs of Habeas Corpus

This matter being called up in open Court upon the return of the writs served upon Leving Hume and Leving O. Hamilton the same is continued until the Fourth Monday of October next to be heard at Kalama in open Court and it is further ordered that the mother of the children alleged to be confined have the privilege of seeing them at her own pleasure and convenience on all proper occassions & under proper conditions
In the Matter of the application of Maria K Peterson for writ of Habeas Corpus
FILED 21st day of Sept 1888, and entered on Page 568 of Journal Pg one
